name: SEO Strategy Planner with Notion
description: Are you struggling to attract visitors to your website? Do you feel like your current SEO strategy is too messy? Worry no more! Our Notion SEO strategy planner is designed to help you organize all your SEO plans, keywords, blogs, emails, and more. It can help you boost your website's rankings and drive more traffic to your site.As a growth hacking expert, I know that search engine optimization (SEO) is a critical aspect of any successful online business. It is essential to have an effective SEO
features: Clearly define your SEO goals; Document your comprehensive keyword research; Plan and optimize your content for search engines; Track competitions tactics; Ready-made SEO Template to boost productivity; Build & track your website backlinks; Monitor your SEO performance and make adjustments as needed; Archive all your actions and reports to track progress.
